privacyCash.keyVulnerability: Amounts visible on-chain enable correlation attacks. 40.9% of withdrawals linked to deposits.

shadowWire.keyVulnerability: Bulletproofs hide amounts but addresses are plaintext visible. 46.3% have both sender and recipient exposed.

silentSwap.keyVulnerability: Wallets that both send and receive through SilentSwap are linkable. 9.6% exposure rate.

summary.recommendation: SilentSwap provides the best privacy (90 score, 9.6% linkable) via cross-chain routing. Privacy Cash (59 score, 40.9% linkable) and ShadowWire (54 score, 46.3% linkable) both have significant vulnerabilities - amounts and addresses respectively.
summary.methodology: Analysis based on on-chain data. Privacy Cash attacked via timing+amount correlation. ShadowWire addresses directly visible. SilentSwap attacked via round-trip wallet detection.
